## Checklist

Before requesting review, please ensure:

### Code Quality

- [ ] TypeScript types are correct (`npm run typecheck` passes)
- [ ] Linting passes (`npm run lint` passes)
- [ ] Code is formatted (`npm run format:check` passes)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run build` passes)
- [ ] No console.log statements in production code

### Contact Information & Branding

- [ ] Agent name is "Dr. Jan Duffy" (NOT "Janet")
- [ ] Phone number is "(702) 930-8222" for this site
- [ ] License number is "S.0197614.LLC"
- [ ] "Reverence" is spelled correctly (not "Reference")
- [ ] No placeholder phone numbers (555-XXXX)

### SEO & Metadata

- [ ] Page has unique title and meta description
- [ ] H1 tag is present and descriptive
- [ ] Images have alt text
- [ ] Schema markup is correct (if applicable)

### Functionality

- [ ] Forms submit correctly (if forms were modified)
- [ ] Links work (no 404s)
- [ ] Mobile responsive (tested on mobile device)
- [ ] No console errors in browser

### Security

- [ ] No API keys or secrets in code
- [ ] Environment variables are properly configured
- [ ] User inputs are sanitized (if applicable)

### Testing

- [ ] Tested locally in development environment
- [ ] Tested on mobile device (if UI changes)
- [ ] Manual testing completed for affected features
